GV06apsulb_u:4: pṛṣṭhyāntayorantau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimitaṃ karoti || ĀpŚus_1.2c ||
GV06apsulb_u:9: dīrghasyākṣṇayārajjuḥ pārśvamānī tiryaṅmānī ca yat pṛthagbhute kurutas tad ubhayaṃ karoti || ĀpŚus_1.4a ||
GV06apsulb_u:11: caturaśrasyākṣṇayārajjurdvistavatīṃ bhūmiṃ karoti | samasya dvikaraṇī || ĀpŚus_1.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:12: pramāṇaṃ tṛtīyena vardhayet tac caturthenātmacatustriṃśonena saviśeṣaḥ || ĀpŚus_1.6 ||
GV06apsulb_u:14: pramāṇamātrīṃ rajjum ubhayataḥ pāśāṃ karoti || ĀpŚus_1.7b ||
GV06apsulb_u:15_0: madhye lakṣaṇam ardhamadhyamayoś ca pṛṣṭhyāyāṃ rajjum āyamya pāśayorlakṣaṇeṣviti
GV06apsulb_u:15_1: śaṅkūn nihaty upāntyayoḥ pāśau pratimucya madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya śaṅkuṃ nimittaṃ karoti |
GV06apsulb_u:16: madhyame pāśau pratimucya, uparyupari nimittaṃ madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇamaṃsam āyacchet |
GV06apsulb_u:17: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya madhyamenaiva lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim āyacchet |
GV06apsulb_u:20: pṛṣṭhyāntayor madhye ca śaṅkūn nihatyārdhe 'rdhe tadviśeṣam abhyasya lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvārdhamagamayet |
GV06apsulb_u:21: antyayoḥ pāśau kṛtvā madhyame saviśeṣaṃ pratimucya pūrvasminn itaraṃ lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇamaṅkam āyacchet |
GV06apsulb_u:22: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya lakṣaṇenaiva dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim āyacchet |
GV06apsulb_u:24: pramāṇaṃ tiryag dvikaraṇy āyāmas tasyākṣṇayārajjus trikaraṇī || ĀpŚus_2.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:26: tulyayoś caturaśrayor uktaḥ samāsaḥ | nānāpramāṇayoś caturaśrayoḥ samāsaḥ || ĀpŚus_2.4a ||
GV06apsulb_u:30: caturaśrāc caturaśraṃ nirjihīrṣan yāvan nirjihīrṣet tasya karaṇyā varṣīyaso vṛddhramullikhet || ĀpŚus_2.5a ||
GV06apsulb_u:31: vṛrdhasya pārśvamānīm akṣṇayetarat pārśvam upasaṃharet || ĀpŚus_2.5b ||
GV06apsulb_u:32: sā yatra nipatet tad apacchindyāt || ĀpŚus_2.5c ||
GV06apsulb_u:34: upasaṃhṛtākṣaṇayārajjuḥ sā catuṣkaraṇī chinnā cetarā ca yat pṛthagbhūte kurutas tad ubhayaṃ karoti || ĀpŚus_2.6a ||
GV06apsulb_u:37: dīrghacaturaśraṃ samacaturaśraṃ cikīrṣan tiryaṅmānyāpacchidya śeṣaṃ vibhajyobhayata upadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_2.7a ||
GV06apsulb_u:40: samacaturaśraṃ dīrghacaturaśraṃ cukīrṣanā yāvaccikīrṣet tāvatīṃ pārśvamānīṃ kṛtvā yadadhikaṃ syād yathāyogam upadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_3.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:41: caturaśraṃ maṇḍalaṃ cikīrṣan madhyāt koṭyāṃ nipātayet || ĀpŚus_3.2a ||
GV06apsulb_u:42: pārśvataḥ parikṛṣyātiśayatṛtīyena saha maṇḍalaṃ parilikhet || ĀpŚus_3.2b ||
GV06apsulb_u:45: maṇḍalaṃ caturaśraṃ cikīrṣan viṣkambhaṃ pañcadaśa bhāgān kṛtvā dvāv uddharet |
GV06apsulb_u:52: yāvatpramāṇā rajjus tāvatastāvato vargān karoti || ĀpŚus_3.8a ||
GV06apsulb_u:56: yac ca tena caturaśraṃ kriyate tat koṭyām || ĀpŚus_3.9b ||
GV06apsulb_u:60: āgnyādheyike vihāre gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antarāle vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_4.1a ||
GV06apsulb_u:61: aṣṭāsu prakrameṣu brāhmaṇo 'gnim ādadhīta | ekādaśasu rājanyaḥ | dvādaśasu vaiśyaḥ || ĀpŚus_4.1b ||
GV06apsulb_u:62: caturviṃśatyām aparimite yāvatā vā cakṣuṣā manyate tasmān nātidūram ādheya iti sarveṣām aviśeṣeṇa śrūyate || ĀpŚus_4.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:63: dakṣiṇataḥ purastād vitṛtīyadeśe gārhapatyasya nedīyasi dakṣiṇāgner vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_4.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:64_0: gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antarālaṃ pañcadhā ṣaḍdhā vā saṃvibhajya ṣaṣṭhaṃ saptamaṃ vā
GV06apsulb_u:64_1: bhāgam āgantum upasamasya samaṃ traidhaṃ vibhajyāparasmiṃs tṛtīye lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā
GV06apsulb_u:64_2: gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimittaṃ karoti tad
GV06apsulb_u:66: yajamānamātrī prācy aparimitā vā yathāsannāni havīṃṣi saṃbhaved evaṃ tiraścī prāñcau vedyaṃsāv unnayati |
GV06apsulb_u:67: pratīcī śroṇī purastād aṃhīyasī paścāt prathīyasī madhye saṃnatataraivam iva hi yoṣeti dārśikyā veder vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_4.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:68_0: apareṇāhavanīyaṃ yajamānamātrī dīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya tāvatīṃ rajjum āyamya madhye
GV06apsulb_u:68_1: lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇayoḥ śroṇyaṃsayor antarā niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimittaṃ karoti |
GV06apsulb_u:72: tiryaṅmānīṃ dviguṇāṃ tathā kṛtvā paścāt purastāc copalikhet |
GV06apsulb_u:75: triṃśat padāni prakramā vā paścāttiraśvī bhavati |
GV06apsulb_u:76: ṣaṭtriṃśat prācī caturviṃśatiḥ purastāt tiraścīti saumikyā veder vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_5.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:77_0: ṣaṭtriṃśikāyām aṣṭādaśopasamasya aparasmād antād dvādaśasu lakṣaṇaṃ pañcadaśasu lakṣaṇaṃ
GV06apsulb_u:77_1: pṛṣṭhyāntayor antau niyamya pañcadaśakena dakṣiṇāpāyamya śaṅkuṃ nihantyevam uttarataḥśroṇī |
GV06apsulb_u:84: dvādaśikāpañcikayos trayodaśikākṣṇayārajjuḥ, tābhir aṃsau dvirabhyastābhiḥ śroṇī || ĀpŚus_5.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:89: dakṣiṇasmād aṃsād dvādaśasu dakṣiṇasyāṃ śroṇyāṃ nipātayet |
GV06apsulb_u:93: saumikyā veditṛtīyadeśe yajeteti sautrāmaṇyā veder vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_5.8a ||
GV06apsulb_u:94: prakramāsya dvikaraṇī prakramasthānīyā bhavati trikaraṇyā vā || ĀpŚus_5.8b ||
GV06apsulb_u:95: aṣṭikā daśiketi tiryaṅmānyau | dvādaśikā pṛṣṭhayā || ĀpŚus_5.8c ||
GV06apsulb_u:96: trīṇi caturviṃśāni padaśatāni sautrāmaṇikī vediḥ || ĀpŚus_5.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:97: dvistāvā vedir bhavatīty aśvamedhe vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_5.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:99: prakramo dvipadastripado vā | prakrame yāthākāmī śabdārthasya viśayitvāt || ĀpŚus_6.2a ||
GV06apsulb_u:100: yajamānasyādhvaryorvā | eṣa hi ceṣṭānāṃ kartā bhavati || ĀpŚus_6.2b ||
GV06apsulb_u:101: rathamātrī nirūḍhapaśubandhasya vedir bhavatīti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_6.3a ||
GV06apsulb_u:102: tasya khalvāhū rathākṣamātrī paścāt tiryag īṣayā prācī | vipathayugena purastāt || ĀpŚus_6.3b ||
GV06apsulb_u:107: ṣaḍaśītiyugaṃ cāsya rathaścāraṇa ucyate iti rathaparimāṇam || ĀpŚus_6.5b ||
GV06apsulb_u:108: aratnibhir vā caturbhiḥ paścāt ṣaḍbhiḥ prācī tribhiḥ purastāt |
GV06apsulb_u:109: tad ekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamya dvābhyām adhyardheneti śroṇyaṃsān nirharet || ĀpŚus_6.6 ||
GV06apsulb_u:110: yajamānamātrī catuḥsraktir bhavatīti paitṛkyā veder vijñāyate,
GV06apsulb_u:111: tadekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamyārdhena tataḥ śroṇyaṃsān nirharet || ĀpŚus_6.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:113: tad ekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamyārdhena tataḥ śroṇyaṃsān nirharet || ĀpŚus_6.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:114: tāṃ yugena yajamānasya vā padair vimāya śamyayā parimimīte || ĀpŚus_6.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:115: pade yuge 'ratnāv iyati śamyāyāṃ ca mānārtheṣu yathākāmī śabdārthasya viśayitvāt || ĀpŚus_6.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:116: vimitāyāṃ purastāt pārśvamānyā upasaṃharet | śrutisāmarthyāt || ĀpŚus_6.11 ||
GV06apsulb_u:117: navāratni tiryak saptaviṃśatir udag āyatam iti sadaso vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_7.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:121: aratnimātraṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya sraktiṣu śaṅkūn nihatyārdhaprādeśena taṃ taṃ parilikhec chrutisāmarthyāt || ĀpŚus_7.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:124: karaṇaṃ vyāyāmasya tṛtīyāyāmaṃ saptamavyāsaṃ kārayet || ĀpŚus_7.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:127: maṇḍalāyāṃ mṛdo dehaṃ kṛtvā madhye śaṅkuṃ nihatyārdhavyāyāmena saha maṇḍalaṃ parilikhet || ĀpŚus_7.10a ||
GV06apsulb_u:128: tasmiṃś caturaśram avadadhyād yāvat sambhavet tan navadhā vyavalikhya traidham ekaikaṃ pradhikaṃ vibhajet || ĀpŚus_7.10b ||
GV06apsulb_u:129: upadhāne caturaśrasyāvāntaradeśān prati sraktīḥ sampādayet || ĀpŚus_7.11a ||
GV06apsulb_u:131: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_7.11c ||
GV06apsulb_u:134: mṛdo dehān kṛtvāgnīdhrīyaṃ navadhā vyavalikhya, ekasyāḥ sthāne 'śmānam upapadhyāt || ĀpŚus_7.14 ||
GV06apsulb_u:135: yathāsaṅkhyam itarā vyavalikhya yathāyogam upadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_7.15 ||
GV06apsulb_u:136: bhavatīva khalu vā eṣa yo 'gniṃ cinute iti vijñāyate |
GV06apsulb_u:137: vayasāṃ vā eṣa pratimayā cīyata ityākṛticodanāt |
GV06apsulb_u:139: yāvadāmnānena veṇunā caturaśre ātmani puruṣān avamimote || ĀpŚus_8.2a ||
GV06apsulb_u:140: puruṣaṃ dakṣiṇe pakṣe puruṣaṃ pucche puruṣam uttare || ĀpŚus_8.2b ||
GV06apsulb_u:141: aratninā dakṣiṇato dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣaṃ vardhayati | evam uttarata uttaram || ĀpŚus_8.2c ||
GV06apsulb_u:143: ekavidhaḥ prathamo 'gnir dvividho dvitīyas trividhas tṛtīyaḥ ta evam evodyantyaikaśatavidhāt || ĀpŚus_8.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:144: tad u ha vai saptavidham eva cinvīta |
GV06apsulb_u:146: tata ūrdhvam ekottarān iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_8.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:149: aṣṭavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ yad anyat saptabhyas tat saptadhā vibhajya pratipuruṣam āveśayet || ĀpŚus_8.6a ||
GV06apsulb_u:151: puruṣamātreṇa vimimīte' veṇunā vimimīte, iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_8.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:152: yāvān yajamāna ūrdhvabāhus tāvad antarāle veṇoś chidre karoti madhye tṛtīyam || ĀpŚus_8.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:153: apareṇa yūpāvaṭadeśam anupṛṣṭhyaṃ veṇuṃ nidhāya chidreṣu śaṅkūn nihatyonmucyāparābhyāṃ dakṣiṇāprāk parilikhed āntāt || ĀpŚus_8.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:154: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya dakṣiṇā pratyakparilikhed āntāt || ĀpŚus_8.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:155_0: unmucya veṇuṃ madhyame śaṅkāv antyaṃ veṇoś chidraṃ pratimucyoparyupari lekhāsamaraṃ
GV06apsulb_u:155_1: dakṣiṇā veṇuṃ nidhāyāntye chidre śaṅkuṃ nihatya tasmin madhyamaṃ veṇoś chidraṃ pratimucya
GV06apsulb_u:155_2: lekhāntayor itare pratiṣṭhāpya chidrayoḥ śaṅkū nihanti || ĀpŚus_9.1a ||
GV06apsulb_u:157: evaṃ puradakṣiṇaṃ catura ātmani puruṣānavamimīte || ĀpŚus_9.2a ||
GV06apsulb_u:158: puruṣaṃ dakṣiṇe pakṣe | puruṣaṃ pucche puruṣam uttare || ĀpŚus_9.2b ||
GV06apsulb_u:159: aratninā dakṣiṇato dakṣiṇam ity uktam || ĀpŚus_9.2c ||
GV06apsulb_u:160: pṛṣṭhyāto vā puruṣamātrasyākṣṇayā veṇuṃ nidhāya pūrvasminn itaram |
GV06apsulb_u:164: rajjvā vā vimāyottaravedinyāyena veṇunā vimimīte || ĀpŚus_9.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:165: sapakṣapuccheṣu vidhābhyāse 'pacaye ca vidhāsaptamakaraṇīṃ puruṣasthānīyāṃ kṛtvā viharet || ĀpŚus_9.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:168: puruṣasya pañcamo bhāga ekataḥ prādeśa ekataḥ tat tṛtīyam || ĀpŚus_9.6b ||
GV06apsulb_u:169: sarvataḥ prādeśas tac caturtham | samacaturaśrāḥ pañcadaśabhāgīyās tat pañcamam || ĀpŚus_9.6c ||
GV06apsulb_u:170: ūrvdhvapramāṇamiṣṭakānāṃ jānoḥ jānoḥ pañcamena kārayet || ĀpŚus_9.7a ||
GV06apsulb_u:172: yat pacyamānānāṃ pratihrasīta purīṣeṇa tat sampūrayed aniyataparimāṇatvāt purīṣasya || ĀpŚus_9.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:173: upadhāne 'dhyardhā daśa purastāt pratīcīr ātmany upadadhāti | daśa paścāt prācīḥ || ĀpŚus_10.1a ||
GV06apsulb_u:175: pakṣāpyayayoś ca viśayās tāsām ardheṣṭakāmātrāṇi pakṣayor bhavanti || ĀpŚus_10.1b ||
GV06apsulb_u:176: pañcapañca pucchapārśvayor dakṣiṇā udīcīś ca || ĀpŚus_10.1c ||
GV06apsulb_u:177: pucche prādeśam upadhāya sarvam agniṃ pañcamabhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet || ĀpŚus_10.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:179: aparasmin prastāre 'dhyardhā daśa dakṣiṇata udīcīr ātmany upadadhāti |
GV06apsulb_u:181: yathā prathame prastāre pakṣau tathā puccham |
GV06apsulb_u:182: yathā pucchaṃ tathā pakṣau viparītā apyaye || ĀpŚus_10.4b ||
GV06apsulb_u:185: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_10.6b ||
GV06apsulb_u:187: pañcabhiḥ purīṣair abhyūhatīti purīṣāntā citir arthāntaratvāt purīṣasya || ĀpŚus_10.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:188: jānudaghnīṃ sāhasraṃ cinvīta prathamaṃ cinvānaḥ || ĀpŚus_10.8a ||
GV06apsulb_u:189: nābhidaghnīṃ dviṣāhasraṃ dvitīyam āsyadaghnīṃ triṣāhasraṃ tṛtīyam uttaram uttaraṃ jyāyāmsam || ĀpŚus_10.8b ||
GV06apsulb_u:190: mahāntaṃ bṛhantam aparimitaṃ svargakāmaś cinvīteti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_10.8c ||
GV06apsulb_u:192: triṣāhasra triprastārāś caturthaprabhṛtiṣv āhāreṣu nityam iṣṭakāparimāṇam || ĀpŚus_10.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:193: vijñāyate ca ḥna jyāyāṃsaṃ citvā kanīyāṃsaṃ cinvīteti' || ĀpŚus_10.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:194: caturaśrābhir agniṃ cinuta iti vijñāyata | samacaturaśrā anupapadatvāc chabdasya || ĀpŚus_11.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:195: pādamātrayo bhavanti aratnimātrayo bhavanty ūrvasthimātrayo bhavanty aṇūkamātrayo bhavantīti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_11.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:200: sandhyoś ca tadvad ātmānaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulāpetāḥ || ĀpŚus_11.5a ||
GV06apsulb_u:201: śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau prācīḥ pratīciś ca || ĀpŚus_11.5b ||
GV06apsulb_u:203: pucche prādeśamupadhāya sarvam agniṃ caturbhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet || ĀpŚus_11.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:205: aparasmin prastāre pucchāpyaye pañcamabhāgīyā viśayāḥ || ĀpŚus_11.9a ||
GV06apsulb_u:206: tā ātmani caturdaśabhiḥ pādair yathāyogaṃ paryupadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_11.9b ||
GV06apsulb_u:209: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_11.11b ||
GV06apsulb_u:210: ekavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ karaṇīnāṃ dvādaśena trayodaśenetīṣṭakāḥ kārayet || ĀpŚus_12.1a ||
GV06apsulb_u:211: pādeṣṭakāś ca vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_12.1b ||
GV06apsulb_u:212: ekavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ prathamāhāreṇa dvitīyena tṛtīyeneti yo yujyeta |
GV06apsulb_u:215: praugacitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_12.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:216: yāvānagniḥ sāratniprādeśo dvistāvatīṃ bhūmiṃ caturaśrāṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāc chroṇīṃ pratyālikhet |
GV06apsulb_u:220: ubhayayaḥ praugaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta prajātān bhrātṛvyān nudeya pratijaniṣyamāṇān iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_12.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:222: tāvad eva tīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya pūrvāparayoḥ karaṇyor ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇottarayor nipātayet |
GV06apsulb_u:224: praugacitoktīḥ (-ktaṃ) | ubhayataḥ praugā iṣṭakāḥ kārayet || ĀpŚus_12.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:225: rathacakracitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_12.11 ||
GV06apsulb_u:226: yāvān agniḥ sāratniprādeśas tāvatīṃ bhūmiṃ parimaṇḍalāṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃś caturaśram avadadhyād yāvatsambhavet || ĀpŚus_12.12 ||
GV06apsulb_u:228: tāsāṃ ṣaṭ pradhāv upadhāya śeṣam aṣṭadhā vibhajet || ĀpŚus_13.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:231: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_13.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:233: dvayāni tu khalu droṇāni, caturaśrāṇi parimaṇḍalāni ca || ĀpŚus_13.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:237: paścāt tsarur bhavaty anurūpatvāyeti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_13.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:238: sarvasyā bhūmer daśamaṃ tsarus tasya pucchena nirhāra uktaḥ || ĀpŚus_13.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:239: tasya karaṇyā dvādaśeneṣṭakāḥ kārayet | adhyardhāḥ pādeṣṭakāś ca || ĀpŚus_13.11 ||
GV06apsulb_u:244: aparasmin prastāre 'dhyardhā dakṣiṇata udīcīr ātmany upadadhāty uttarataś ca dakṣiṇās tsarupārśvayor dakṣiṇā utīcīś ca || ĀpŚus_13.15 ||
GV06apsulb_u:248: samūhyaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:250: dikṣu cātvālā bhavanti | tebhyaḥ puraṣimabhyudūhatīti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:251: paricāyyaṃ cinvīta grāmakāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:252: madhyamāṃ svayamātṛṇṇāṃ pradakṣiṇamiṣṭakāgaṇaiḥ paricinoti | sa pariyāyyaḥ || ĀpŚus_14.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:253: upacāyyaṃ cinvīta grāmakāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.6 ||
GV06apsulb_u:255: śmaśānacitaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayet pitṛloka ṛdhnuyāmiti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:256: dvayāni khalu śmamaśānāni caturaśrāṇi parimaṇḍalāni ca || ĀpŚus_14.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:260: chandaścitaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.13 ||
GV06apsulb_u:261: sarvaiś chandobiś cinuyād ity ekam | prākṛtair ity aparam || ĀpŚus_14.14 ||
GV06apsulb_u:262: śyenacitaṃ cinvīta suvargakāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_15.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:266: evam iva hi vayasāṃ madhye pakṣanirṇāmo bhavatīti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_15.2b ||
GV06apsulb_u:269: tāsāṃ tisraḥ śira itarat pakṣayor vibhajet || ĀpŚus_15.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:274: ardhadaśamā aratnayo 'ṅgulayaś ca caturbhāgonāḥ pakṣāyāmaḥ || ĀpŚus_15.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:277: pakṣasyāparayoḥ koṭyor antau niyamya lakṣaṇena prācīnam āyacched evaṃ purastāt |
GV06apsulb_u:284: śirasy ardhapuruṣeṇa caturaśraṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇayor nipātayet || ĀpŚus_15.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:287: karaṇaṃ puruṣasya pañcamāyāmaṃ ṣaṣṭhavyāsaṃ kārayed yathāyoganataṃ tatprathamam || ĀpŚus_16.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:288: te dve prācī saṃhite | tad dvitīyam || ĀpŚus_16.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:289: prathamasya ṣaḍbhāgam aṣṭabhāgena vardhayet | yathāyoganataṃ tat tṛtīyam || ĀpŚus_16.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:290: caturbhāgīyādhyardhā | tasyāś caturbhāgīyāmātram akṣṇayā chindyāt | tac caturtham || ĀpŚus_16.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:297: evamanyat | uttaraṃ tūttarasyāḥ koṭyālikhet tad aṣṭamam || ĀpŚus_16.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:299: upadhāne ṣaṣṭiḥṣaṣṭiḥ pakṣayoḥ prathamā udīcīrnir upadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_16.11 ||
GV06apsulb_u:300: pucchapārśvayor aṣṭāvaṣṭau ṣaṭhyayas tisro 'gre tata ekān tatas tisraḥ tata ekā || ĀpŚus_16.12 ||
GV06apsulb_u:301: pucchāpyaye caturthyau viśaye | tayos tu paścāt pañcamyāv anīkasaṃhite || ĀpŚus_16.12 ||
GV06apsulb_u:302: śeṣe daśa caturthyaḥ śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau prācīḥ pratīcīś ca || ĀpŚus_17.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:303: śeṣe ca ṣaḍviṃśatir aṣṭau ṣaṣṭayaś catasraḥ pañcamyaḥ || ĀpŚus_17.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:304: śirasi caturthyau viśaye | tayoś ca purastāt prācyau || ĀpŚus_17.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:307: apyayayoś ca tṛtīyā ātmānam aṣṭabhāgāvetāḥ || ĀpŚus_17.5a ||
GV06apsulb_u:312: śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau caturthyo dakṣiṇā udīcīś ca || ĀpŚus_17.7a ||
GV06apsulb_u:313: śeṣe ca viṃśatis triṃśat ṣaṣṭhayaḥ ekāṃ pañcamīm || ĀpŚus_17.7b ||
GV06apsulb_u:314: śirasi caturthyau tayoś ca purastāccatasro navamyaḥ || ĀpŚus_17.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:316: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_17.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:317: śyenacitaṃ cinvīta suvargakāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_18.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:321: evam iva hi vayasāṃ madhye pakṣanirṇāmo bhavatīti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_18.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:322: puruṣasya ṣoḍaśabhir viṃśaṃ śataṃ sāratniprādeśaḥ saptavidhaḥ saṃpadyate |
GV06apsulb_u:323: tāsāṃ catvāriṃśadātmani tisraḥ śirasi pañcadaśa puccha ekatriṃśad dakṣiṇe pakṣe tathottare || ĀpŚus_18.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:324: adhyardhapuruṣas tiryag dvāv āyāmata iti dīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya śroṇyaṃsebhyo dve dve ṣoḍasyau nirasyet |
GV06apsulb_u:327: śirasyardhapuruṣeṇa caturaśraṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇottarayor nipātayet || ĀpŚus_18.5a ||
GV06apsulb_u:329: puruṣas tiryag dvāv āyāmataḥ ṣoḍaśabhāgaś ca dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ | tathottaraḥ || ĀpŚus_18.6 ||
GV06apsulb_u:330: pakṣāgrepakṣāgre puruṣacaturthena catvāri caturaśrāṇi kṛtvā tāny akṣṇayā vyavalikhyārdhāni nirasyet |
GV06apsulb_u:332: pakṣāgram utsṛjya madhye pakṣasya prācīṃ lekhām ālikhet || ĀpŚus_18.8a ||
GV06apsulb_u:333: pakṣāpyaye puruṣaṃ niyamya lekhāyāṃ puruṣānte nitodantukuryāt |
GV06apsulb_u:334: nitodāt prācīnaṃ puruṣānte nitodaṃ nitodayor nānāntāv ālikhet |
GV06apsulb_u:337: dvipuruṣaṃ pascādardhapuruṣaṃ purastāc caturbhāgonaḥ puruṣa āyāmo 'ṣṭādaśakaraṇyo pārśvayos tāḥ pañcadaśaparigṛhṇanti |
GV06apsulb_u:340: aṣṭamena tribhir aṣṭamaiś caturthena caturthasaviśeṣeṇeti || ĀpŚus_19.2b ||
GV06apsulb_u:341: ardheṣṭakāṃ tribhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ caturthasaviśeṣeṇeti || ĀpŚus_19.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:342: pādeṣṭakāṃ tribhiś caturthenaikaṃ caturthasaviśeṣārdhābhyāṃ ceti || ĀpŚus_19.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:343: pakṣeṣṭakāṃ caturbhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ dvisaptamābhyāṃ ceti || ĀpŚus_19.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:344: pakṣamadhyīyāṃ caturbhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ dvisaptamābhyāṃ ceti || ĀpŚus_19.6 ||
GV06apsulb_u:345: pakṣāgrīyāṃ tribhiś caturthenaikaṃ caturthasaptamābhyām ekaṃ caturthasaviśeṣasaptamābhyāṃ ceti || ĀpŚus_19.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:353: apareṇaikādaśa pūrveṇa pucchāpyayaṃ pañcāpareṇa pañca pañcadaśa pucchāgre || ĀpŚus_19.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:354: catasraścatasraḥ pakṣāgrīyāḥ pakṣāgrayoḥ pakṣāpyayayoś ca viśayāḥ || ĀpŚus_20.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:355: tā ātmani catasṛbhiś catasṛbhiḥ ṣoḍaśībhir yathāyogaṃ paryupadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_20.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:360: aparasmin prastāre purastāc chirasi dve ṣoḍaśyau bāhyaviśeṣe upadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_20.6a ||
GV06apsulb_u:364: ātmanaḥ karaṇīnāṃ sandhiṣu ṣoḍaśyo bāhyaviśeṣā upadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_20.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:370: yac caturaśraṃ tryaśraṃ vā saṃpadyetārdheṣṭakābhiḥ pādeṣṭakābhir vā pracchādayet || ĀpŚus_20.12 ||
GV06apsulb_u:372: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_20.14 ||
GV06apsulb_u:373: kaṅkacid alajacid iti śyenacitā vyākhyātau || ĀpŚus_21.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:374: evami va hi śyenasya varṣīyāṃsau pakṣau pucchād vakrau saṃnataṃ pucchaṃ dīrgha ātmā maṇḍalaṃ śiraś ca |
GV06apsulb_u:378: kaṅkacitaṃ śīrṣaṇvantaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta saśīrṣo 'muṣmiṃl loke saṃbhaveyam iti vidyamāne kathaṃ brūyāt || ĀpŚus_21.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:379: prākṛtau vakrau pakṣau saṃnataṃ pucchaṃ vikāraśravaṇāt || ĀpŚus_21.4a ||
GV06apsulb_u:381: yatho etac cheyanacitaṃ cinvīteti | yāvadāmnānasārūpyaṃ tad vyākhyātam || ĀpŚus_21.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:384: dīrghacaturaśrāṇāṃ samāsena pakṣapucchānāṃ samāsa uktaḥ || ĀpŚus_21.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:386: tatra puruṣābhyāso nāratniprādeśānāṃ saṅkhyāsaṃyogāt saṅkhyāsaṃyogāt || ĀpŚus_21.10 ||
